subject: CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA PLC
body:
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA PLC
Foreign Remittance Department
F93q, Marina Rd, Lagos Island, Lagos Nigeria
E-Mail: 
cbn.governorls@gmail.com
Tel: +234 912 265 7815
19-10-2023
CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA PLC FUND RELEASE REQUIREMENT
Dear  , 
We are in receipt of your email and the content well noted. This is to officially confirm to you that We have received a payment release order and instruction from the senate committee on debt reconciliation and evaluation federal republic of Nigeria to credit your account with your unpaid fund of US$30,000,000.00 and your payment Release order file has been forwarded to us for immediate release of the payment.
In view of this, We hereby want to assure you that your money will be released and transferred into your nominated bank account and you will confirm it in your account within six hours as I have been mandated by the senate committee on debt Federal Republic of Nigeria as long as you will abide with this bank's rules and regulation by following the bank's instruction in order to help us and yourself in receiving your payment without any hitch or wasting any time
Note,your fund release order file have been forwarded to the federal ministry of finance Nigeria (FMF) this morning for issuance of a foreign exchange allocation mandate approval Order which will enable us transfer your money into your nominated account without any problem as the money we are about to release and transfer into your account from here is not in our local currency.
In regards to this, you are hereby advised to fill the processing form below and return it back to this office as soon as possible, to enable us proceed with your payment process because your foreign exchange allocation mandate approval order will be ready before noon  as we have been told by the chairman minister of finance.
BENEFICIARY'S INFORMATION
Beneficiary Name:_____________ Beneficiary Address:_________________ Personal Tel:_____________________
Current occupation_______________ Age: _____________________Marital Status:_____________
A Scan Copy of Your Fund Release Order Document Which You must receive from The Senate President of Nigeria, Senator Godswill Akpabio which authenticates you as the rightful beneficiary of the Fund we are about to release to you.
BANKING DETAILS
Receiving Bank Name:______________ Receiving Bank Address:__________ Bank Routing Number:__________________
Swift Code :______________ Account Holder's Name:_______________________ Account Number:____________________
NEXT OF KIN INFORMATION
Next Of Kin Name Next Of Kin Address:_____________________________
Next Of Kin Age:____________ Next Of Kin Tel:_________________
I, Mr./Mrs./Miss.......................................................... Confirm That The Above Completed Information Is True And That I Will Become Legally Liable When Same Is Used To Complete Procedures For Payment Of My Claim.
As soon as you fill the above form, we shall proceed to the next step to make sure you receive your payment without wasting any more time as we have been instructed by the Senate President and Chairman Senate committee on debt reconciliation and evaluation Federal Republic of Nigeria.
We shall proceed with your payment with immediate effect as soon as we hear from you.
I await for your Urgent response
yours In Service.
Mr. Akubia Biko
Director: Foreign Remittance Depart.
CC. ANTI FRAUD AND DEBT UNIT
CC. FEDERAL MINISTRY OF JUSTICE (FMJ)
CC. FEDERAL MINISTRY OF FINANCE (FMF)
CC. THE OFFICE OF THE PRESIDENT ON FINANCIAL MATTERS
CC. OFFICE OF THE ACCOUNTANT GENERAL OF THE FEDERATION (AGF)

subject: Re:   CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA PLC
body:
Hello Mr. Akubia Biko,

Thank you for your email and the detailed information provided. It's quite a surprise to hear about this unpaid fund, I must say.

I'm curious though, how did my name come up in relation to this fund? And could you please provide more details about the Senate committee on debt and evaluation federal republic of Nigeria? I'd love to know more about their work.

Also, could you clarify what the foreign exchange allocation mandate approval order is? I'm not very familiar with these financial terms.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA PLC
body:
*THE NATIONAL ASSEMBLY*

*FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA*

*ANTI-FRAUD & DEBT UNIT*

*ZONE 1 WUSE ABUJA-NIGERIA*

*(MOTT O: UNITY AND FAITH, PEACE AND PROGRESS)*





SEN. GODSWILL AKPABIO

SENATE PRESIDENT AND CHAIRMAN SENATE COMMITTEE ON

DEBT RECONCILIATION & EVALUATION

FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA







*THE TRUTH OF THE MATTER*

TO






ATTENTION MARY


DO CONTACT HIM DIRECTLY.


REGARDS




*SEN. GODSWILL AKPABIOSENATE PRESIDENT AND THECHAIRMAN SENATE COMMITTEE
ONDEBT RECONCILIATION & EVALUATION FGN*

subject: Re: CENTRAL BANK OF NIGERIA PLC
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm Mary, and it's a pleasure to make your acquaintance. Your message seems quite important, but I must admit, I'm not entirely sure what it's about. Could you please provide more details? 

You mentioned someone I should contact directly. Who is this person and how are they related to the National Assembly of the Federal Republic of Nigeria? Also, could you explain more about the role of the Senate Committee on Debt Evaluation?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary
